data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Schlüter, Nils, Kutscher, Manfred, Smith, Andrew B., Jagt, John W. M., Lees, Jackie A. (2012): Late Cretaceous phymosomatids and the true identity of Cidarites granulosus Goldfuss, 1829 (Echinoidea, Phymosomatoida). Zootaxa 3271: 17-30, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.210594
